mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_APP_ORDER ( REC_ID, ORDER_ID, USER_ID, CREATETIME , REGAMOUNT, REGGOLD, CTYPE, CHANNEL ) VALUES ( #{REC_ID}, #{ORDER_ID}, #{USER_ID}, now(), #{REGAMOUNT}, #{REGGOLD}, #{CTYPE}, #{CHANNEL} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_app_order SET ORDER_NO = #{ORDER_NO}, STATUS=#{STATUS}, REGGOLD = #{REGGOLD} WHERE ORDER_ID = #{ORDER_ID}
mapper.select:
SELECT o.ORDER_ID, o.`STATUS`, o.REGAMOUNT, o.REGGOLD, o.CREATETIME, u.CNEE_NAME FROM sys_app_order o LEFT JOIN sys_app_user u ON o.USER_ID=u.USER_ID WHERE 1=1
